Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
alerting \alerting\ n. (Physiol.) a state of readiness to respond. alerting was indicated by the desynchronization of the EEG
Syn: alertness [WordNet 1.5]
2. a warning serves to make you more alert to danger.
Syn: alert [WordNet 1.5]
alerting n 1: a state of readiness to respond; "alerting was indicated by the desynchronization of the EEG" [syn: {alertness}] 2: a warning serves to make you more alert to danger [syn: {alert}]
